fields.name: Parameters (start)
fields.value:
`food_can_always_eat` - Can this food item always be eaten? Requires `is_food`
`food_using_converts_to` - What the food item converts to when used
`is_explodable` - Is the item explodable?
`allow_in_offhand` - Controls if the item can be equipped in offhand
`wearable_slot` - If wearable, defines which armor slot the item belongs to
`armor_protection` - Armor protection level, integer input
`cooldown` - Does the item require a usage cooldown?

fields.name: Parameters (checkpoint)
fields.value:
`step1_file` - The step1 file obtained from `/item start`
`cooldown_category` - The category of cooldown
`cooldown_duration` - Duration of cooldown, decimal input
`damage` - Attack damage
`place_block` - Block placer item component
`block_to_place` - Placement block name, requires `place_block`
`use_block_description` - Is the block description used? Requires `place_block`
`place_entity` - Entity placer item component
`entity_to_place` - The entity to place, requires `place_entity`
`entity_use_on` - Comma-separated block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on, requires `place_entity`
`entity_dispense_on` - Comma-separated block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be dispensed on, requires `place_entity`
